column1: # SEAT TIER PRIMER  (Higher number = better seat)
# 10 = Premium Plus Middle  (better than Main Cabin aisle per user pref)
# - Only rows with Active="Y" are monitored.
# - Rows beginning with "#" are ignored entirely.
# - CurrentTier must match the appropriate seat tier above.
# HOW TO UPDATE THIS FILE (Desktop _ GitHub)
# 1. Open this flights.csv file on your computer and make your edits.
#    - Add new flights as new rows.
#    - Update CurrentSeat and CurrentTier as your seat changes.
#    - Change Active to "Y" or "N" depending on whether you want tracking.
# 3. In the folder view, click the **"Add file"** button (top-right).
# 5. Select your updated flights.csv from your desktop.
# 7. The GitHub Action will automatically use the new file on the next run.
